name: Frerich Raabe
bio: I've been using and enjoying Python in both hobby as well as professional projects for a few years now. Yet, I never cease to be amazed about how Python programs can be concise without being obfuscated or cryptic.

name: Pedro Tavares
bio: I love Python. I'm from Portugal. Started learning by myself a few years ago. Love to teach so that way I assure myself that I fully understand. Currently studying Software Engineering. I'm awesome :)

name: Hristo Filaretov
bio: I think of learning as a collaborative experience and Exercism beautifully encompasses that belief. Python and C have been my bread and butter ever since I got into software. Currently learning Rust.
